channel.title: Need more people in the help thread
channel.description:
@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
When I run this it can't find my java, I've tried other methods but none seem to succeed. Any help?

item.title: Need more people in the help thread
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Please follow the many guides and stickies about batch files and setting up java.

Read full topic
item.source: Need more people in the help thread

item.title: Need more people in the help thread
item.dc:creator: @Justinnn Justinnn
item.description:
@Justinnn wrote:

@echo off
title Client
java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

When I run this it can’t find my java, I’ve tried other methods but none seem to succeed. Any help?

Read full topic
